message: Once Mizuki is gone, I turn toward the center of the commotion.
While Rhyme isn't exactly my boat, I don't have anything against it either. I was actually pretty curious the first time Mizuki brought it up.

name: 蓮
message: "What's the matter?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nothing. Let's go."
I pat Ren's head and start to make my way out of the alley.
But then―
A white light swallows the world.
Before I can figure out what's going on, a ball of light appears in front of me.
It gradually assumes a human form, then reaches toward me with one hand.
Its fingertips stroke my cheek... or at least, I think they do.
The next thing I know, I'm at the center of the crowd.

name: 蒼葉
message: "H-Huh? Woah!"
Bodies press in from all sides. I'm trapped!

name: 男の歓声１
message: "Usui! Usui!"
A circle of light is floating above the ground, and inside it...
...a woman with eight arms appears, swaying slowly before coming to a stop.

name: 卯水
message: "It's time for what you've all been waiting for: Rhyme!"

name: 卯水
message: "Today's first battle: Player versus Route 44!"
...So this is Rhyme. I've never seen it up close before.
The eight-armed woman is Usui, who presides over all Rhyme battles.
I say woman, but for some reason, it has a deep, manly voice.
Usui's hands flicker. The light grows brighter, and a huge virtual screen appears overhead.
The fighters are already in the ring, preparing their Allmates.

name: 卯水
message: "Will the rookie break Player's winning streak?! Let's find out!"

name: 卯水
message: "Player is ready for battle! Route 44, ready to go?"

name: 卯水
message:
"Alright! Let's get this party started!
GAME... START!!!"
Usui lifts its hands with a gentle grace, its elegant movements a sharp contrast to its booming voice.
The monitor switches to a view of the field. The audience hoots and cheers.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Agh!"
Suddenly, a sharp pain shoots through my head.
What the hell? Is the noise getting to me?
Clutching my forehead, I glare at the crowd.

name: 蓮
message: "Are you alright?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm fine. But we should get going."

name: 蓮
message: "That would be for the best."
I finally manage to muscle my way out of the roaring throng.
Leaning against a nearby wall, I sigh and catch my breath.
